name: @mhlc/web
description: GitHub project for the website of Mt. Horeb Lutheran Church, Chapin, SC - <https://mthoreb.net/>

scripts.release:demo: rm -rf ./docs/* && npm run build:demo -w mhlc-ui && cp -r ./mhlc-ui/dist/* ./docs && touch ./docs/.nojekyll
scripts.start: npm run build:ui && npm run start -w mhlc-content-api

author: MHLC Technology Team
